concept.title: SMC PGI 5315.404-1 -90 Pricing Assistance or Pricing Assistance Waiver

li.p: (a) The requirement for mandatory pricing assistance for sole source PEO (Systems) valued at $25M or more and sole source Enterprise actions under $100M is waived (see “ Delegation of Clearance Approval Authorities and Waiver of Pricing Assistance Threshold ” memo dated 01 Oct 19). Contracting officers may request pricing assistance for contract actions below $100M on a case-by-case basis.
